title: 87/331/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 June 1987 repealing Decision 86/228/EEC authorizing the United Kingdom to restrict the marketing of seed of a variety of an agricultural plant species (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 June 1987
repealing Decision 86/228/EEC authorizing the United Kingdom to restrict the marketing of seed of a variety of an agricultural plant species
(Only the English text is authentic)
(87/331/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The authorization referred to in Article 1 of Decision 86/228/EEC is hereby withdrawn.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 June 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
